name: Akimbo Chase
description:
Jump from car to car in bullet time to eliminate the cartel and become the Akimbo Chaser!

Akimbo Chase has been made in one week for the 7 Days FPS Jam.

Thomas Gonzalez - Technical Game Designer
Thibaud Bousquet - Technical Artist

Big thanks to our two main inspirations:

  • Il faut flinguer Ramirez by Nicolas Petrimaux
  • Pursuit Force by Bigbig Studios
